|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B4G16460-BCK0; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B071Y3S27S |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Specifications=== :'''Banana Pi M2 Plus Board''' *CPU: [[Allwinner]] H3 Quad-core (ARM Cortex-A7) H.265/HEVC 4K *GPU: Mali-400 MP2 @600MHz, Supports OpenGL ES 2.0 *Memory: 1GB DDR3 (shared with GPU) *Flash: 8GB eMMC flash onboard *Network: 1x 10/100/1000 Ethernet *WiFi & BT: [[AMPAK]] AP6212, BT 4.0, SDIO (option AP6181, AP6335) *Video Input: A CSI input connector :Camera: Supports 8-bit YUV422 CMOS sensor interface, :Supports CCIR656 protocol for NTSC and PAL, :Supports SM pixel camera sensor, :Supports video capture solution up to 1080p@30fps *Video Outputs: Supports HDMI output with HDCP, CEC, 3D function, :Integrated CVBS, Supports simultaneous output of HDMI and CVBS *Audio Outputs: HDMI *Power: 5V/2A DC input can, but USB OTG input don’t supply power *USB 2.0 ports: two USB 2.0 HOST, one USB 2.0 OTG *GPIO: 40x Pins Header, compatible with Raspberry Pi B+ *LED: Power led & Status led *IR: IR input on board *OS: Android, Ubuntu, Debian, Raspberry Pi Image, OpenWRT
==Links of Interest== *[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Banana_Pi ''Banana Pi'' on '''Wikipedia'''] *[http://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-M2%2B ''Banana Pi BPI-M2+'' on '''Banana Pi''' Wiki]
